name.description: The name of the PSC endpoint.

project_id.description: The ID of the project where the PSC endpoint will be created.

region.description: The region where the PSC endpoint will be created.

subnetwork.description: The self-link of the subnetwork to which the PSC endpoint will be attached.

network.description: The self-link of the network to which the PSC endpoint will be attached.

service_attachment.description: The self-link of the service attachment to which the PSC endpoint will connect.
